column4: can I please have a yahoo or msn IM chat with someone who knows a lot about APT's signed certificate shizz?
does anyone know about APT security?
it's pretty secure, i think--everything has a gpg key
i haven't had any problem with that...
generally, your default sources.list contains valid listings
why don't you just /msg this person?
how is that file going to affect my framebuffer resolution?
add this as a kernel parameter:   vga=792
aha, yes, I remember... *tries to block memories of gentoo*
so just stick that after ro quiet splash
